title: How to Import Images Into Photomeister

steps.headline: Open up Photomeister.
steps.description: The screenshot shows your initial screen when you first open up the software.

steps.headline: Start the Import Wizard.
steps.description: This is what you need to do to get your images imported.

steps.headline: Choose where to get your images.
steps.description: You can get them from a camera, your computer, or a TWAIN source.

steps.headline: Navigate your way to the folders.
steps.description: You should know where your images are kept on your computer.

steps.headline: Click on OK.
steps.description: This will bring up Photomeister with your imported images.

text: Open up Photomeister. The screenshot shows your initial screen when you first open up the software. Click on Import Photos...  Start the Import Wizard. This is what you need to do to get your images imported. Choose where to get your images. You can get them from a camera, your computer, or a TWAIN source. Navigate your way to the folders. You should know where your images are kept on your computer. Click on OK. This will bring up Photomeister with your imported images.
